member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.SingletonRaceLoser
member.summary: Indicates whether singleton should be created using a double-check locking technique or via an interlocked-compare-exchange technique.

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.SingletonRaceLoser.Block
member.summary: If there is a race to create the singleton, the race is resolved by blocking all but one thread.

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.SingletonRaceLoser.GC
member.summary: If there is a race to create the singleton, the race is resolved by having all threads create the singleton but, when done, only one thread will win and the losing threads will have their singleton GC'd

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.Singleton`1
member.summary: This class ensures that only one singleton object is used if mutliple threads race to create one simultaneously.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.Singleton`1.#ctor(Wintellect.Threading.SingletonRaceLoser,Wintellect.Threading.Singleton{`0}.Creator)
member.summary: Constructs a Singleton object that knows how to create a singleton object.
member.param: Indicates how to arbitrate a race between multiple thread attempting to create the singleton object.
Refers to the method that knows how to create the singleton object.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.Singleton`1.Value
member.summary: Returns the singleton object.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.Singleton`1.Creator
member.summary: A delegate that refers to a method that creates a singleton object.
member.returns: The singleton object.

member.name: T:Wintellect.ExceptionArgs
member.summary: A base class that a custom exception would derive from in order to add its own exception arguments.

member.name: P:Wintellect.ExceptionArgs.Message
member.summary: The string message associated with this exception.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Exception`1
member.summary: Represents errors that occur during application execution.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.#ctor(`0,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with additional arguments, a specified error message, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The exception's additional arguments.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with additional arguments and a specified error message.
member.param: The exception's additional arguments.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.ToString
member.summary: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
member.returns: A hash code for the current Object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Exception`1.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.

member.returns: true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx
member.summary: Provides atomic operations for variables that are shared by multiple threads.

member.summary: Atomically modifies an Int32 value using an algorithm identified by .
member.typeparam: The type of the return value.
The type of the argument passed to the callback method.
member.param: A reference to the Int32 value that is to be modified atomically.
A value of type that will be passed on to the callback method.
The algorithm that modifies the Int32 returning a new Int32 value and another return value to be returned to the caller.
member.returns: The desired Int32 value.

member.summary: Compares two values for equality and, if they are equal, replaces one of the values.
member.return: Returns true if the value in was equal the the value of .
member.param: The destination, whose value is compared with and possibly replaced with .
The value that is compared to the value at .
The value that might get placed into .

member.summary: Compares two values for equality and, if they are equal, replaces one of the values.
member.remarks: The previous value in is returned in .
member.return: Returns true if the value in was equal the the value of .
member.param: The destination, whose value is compared with and possibly replaced with .
The value that is compared to the value at .
The value that might get placed into .
The previous value that was in prior to calling this method.

The value that might get placed into .

The previous value that was in prior to calling this method.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.Add(System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a 32-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the first value to be added. The sum of the two values is stored in .
The value to be added to the integer at .
member.returns: The new value stored at .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.Max(System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Increases a value to a new value if the new value is larger.
member.param: A variable containing the value that might be increased to a new maximum.
The value that if larger than will be placed in .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.Min(System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decreases a value to a new value if the new value is smaller.
member.param: A variable containing the value that might be decreased to a new minimum.
The value that if smaller than will be placed in .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.DecrementIfGreaterThan(System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrements a value by 1 if the value is greater than the specified value (usually 0).
member.param: A variable containing the value that might be decremented.
The value that target must be greater than in order for the decrement to occur.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.AddModulo(System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrements a value by 1 if the value is greater than 0.
member.param: A variable containing the value that might be decremented.
The value to add to target before calculating the modulo specified in .
The value to use for the modulo operation.
member.returns: Returns the previous value of .

member.summary: Bitwise ANDs two 32-bit integers and replaces the first integer with the ANDed value, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the first value to be ANDed. The bitwise AND of the two values is stored in .
The value to AND with .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.Or(System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Bitwise ORs two 32-bit integers and replaces the first integer with the ORed value, as an atomic operation.

The value to OR with .

member.summary: Bitwise ANDs two 32-bit integers with a mask replacing the first integer with the ANDed value, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the first value to be ANDed. The bitwise AND of the two values is stored in .
The value to AND with .
The value to AND with prior to ANDing with .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.MaskedOr(System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Bitwise ORs two 32-bit integers with a mask replacing the first integer with the ORed value, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the first value to be ORed. The bitwise OR of the two values is stored in .
The value to OR with .
The value to AND with prior to ORing with .

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.InterlockedEx.MaskedXor(System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Bitwise XORs two 32-bit integers with a mask replacing the first integer with the XORed value, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the first value to be XORed. The bitwise XOR of the two values is stored in .
The value to XOR with .
The value to AND with prior to XORing with .

member.summary: Sets a variable to a specified value as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the value to be replaced.
The bits to leave unaffected in prior to ORing with .
The value to reaplce with.

member.summary: Adds two integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
member.param: A variable containing the value to be replaced.
The value to add to .
The bits in that should not be affected by adding.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator
member.summary: A class that can drive an iterator asynchronously allowing for scalable and responsive applications and components.

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.MaxDiscardGroup
member.summary: A discard group can be any number from 0 to MaxDiscardGroup.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.FromAsyncResult(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Returns the AsyncEnumerator object used to obtain this IAsyncResult object.
member.param: An IAsyncResult object previously returned by calling BeginExecute.
member.returns: A reference to the AsyncEnumerator object that was used to call BeginExecute.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.ThrowOnMissingDiscardGroup(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a flag indicating whether the AsyncEnumerator should throw an exception if you call a BeginXxx method without calling the End or EndVoid method passing a discard group. This method exists to allow some runtime checks to help ensure that you are writing your code correctly.
member.param: Pass true to turn checking on; false to turn it off.

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.m_asyncResult
member.summary: The IAsyncResult object that allows the iteration to execute asynchronously

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AsyncEnumerator class.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AsyncEnumerator class identified with a debug tag.
member.param: The desired debug tag name for this AsyncEnumerator object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.BeginExecute(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator{System.Int32},System.AsyncCallback)
member.summary: Begins executing an interator and returns after the iterator's first yield return statement executes.
member.param: Identifies the iterator method to be driven by the AsyncEnumerator,
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the iterator completes.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.BeginExecute(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator{System.Int32},System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins executing an interator and returns after the iterator's first yield return statement executes.
member.param: Identifies the iterator method to be driven by the AsyncEnumerator,
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the iterator completes.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndExecute(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous operation to complete.
member.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous operation to finish.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.OnConstructAsyncResult(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Called to construct an AsyncResult object with the specified callback function and state.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the iterator completes.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
member.returns: The AsyncResult object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.OnCompleteAsyncResult
member.summary: Called when the asynchronous operation completes.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.End
member.summary: Pass this to a BegixXxx method's AsyncCallback argument to have the operation complete to advance the enumerator. The operation is implicitly part of discard group 0.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EnqueueCompletedOpToInbox(System.Object)
member.summary: Called internally when an async operation completes
member.param: The IAsyncResult (for a non-discardable) or the DiscardableAsyncResult (for a discardable) operation.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.TryEnqueueCompletedOpToInbox(Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.AsyncResultWrapper)
member.summary: Rejects a completed DiscardableAsyncResult if its group has been discarded; if not rejected, the DiscardableAsyncResult is added to the inbox.
member.param: The completed AsyncResultWrapper
member.returns: True if the AsyncResultWrapper was added to the inbox; false if it was rejected.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.DequeueAsyncResult
member.summary: Dequeues a completed AsyncResultWrapper's IAsyncResult object from the inbox.
member.returns: The completed DiscardableAsyncResult's IAsyncResult object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.DiscardAsyncResultsBelongingToDiscardedGroups
member.summary: Discards previously-completed DiscardableAsyncResult objects from the inbox if their discard group has been discarded

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.IsDebuggingEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if the EnableDebugging method has ever been called.
member.returns: true if EnableDebugging has ever been called.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EnableDebugSupport
member.summary: Call this method to enable operation debugging support. When enabled, call stacks are captured and recorded when End methods are invoked. As operations complete, the call stacks are discarded. Calling ToString on an AsyncEnumerator object will shows its tag, the time stamp of the last 'yield return' statement executed and the collection of its outstanding operations (tags and line/file where the End method was called for it). Typically, you'd examine this information in a debugger. Because capturing call stacks hurts performance, you should only enable debugging support to help you solve a problem related to operations that do not complete.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.GetInProgressList
member.summary: Returns the AsyncEnumerator objects are are in progress of executing an iterator. The list returned is sorted. Element 0 identifes the AsyncEnumerator that has been waiting the longest for its operations to complete. The last element has been waiting the shortest amount of time.
member.returns: The sorted list of in-progress AsyncEnumerator objects.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.SetOperationTag(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the debug tag name of the next operation that you are initiating as indicated by the netx call to an End method. This method is marked with the [Conditional("AsyncEnumeratorDebug")] attribute.
member.param: The debug tag name for the next operation you are initiating.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.ToString
member.summary: Returns debug information about the AsyncEnumerator object. The information includes the Name (passed in the constructor). If EnableDebugging has been called, then the last yield timestamp and source code line/file is also displayed.
member.returns: String contianing helpful debugging information.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.DiscardGroup(System.Int32)
member.summary: Discards all operations that are part of the specified discard group from the Inbox.
member.param: The discard group number (0-MaxDiscardGroup).

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.End(System.Int32,Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndObjectXxx)
member.summary: Pass the result of this method to a BegixXxx method's AsyncCallback argument to have a cancelable operation complete to advance the enumerator.
member.param: Identifies an operation sequence number used for cancelation. The number passed must be between 0 and MaxDiscardGroup.
The EndXxx method that must be called when this canceled operation eventually completes.
member.returns: The value that should be passed to a BeginXxx method's AsyncCallback argument.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndVoid(System.Int32,Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndVoidXxx)
member.summary: Pass the result of this method to a BegixXxx method's AsyncCallback argument to have a cancelable operation complete to advance the enumerator.
member.param: Identifies an operation sequence number used for cancelation. The number passed must be between 0 and 63.
The EndXxx method that must be called when this canceled operation eventually completes.
member.returns: The value that should be passed to a BeginXxx method's AsyncCallback argument.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.SetCancelTimeout(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Causes a timer to automatically call Cancel.
member.param: How long to wait before Cancel is called.
Identifies the cancelValue to be passed to Cancel.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.Cancel(System.Object)
member.summary: Tells the iterator to Cancel all of its remaining operations.
member.param: An arbitrary value that can be examined by the iterator. This value is returned by IsCanceled.
member.returns: Returns True if the calling thread is the first thread to call Cancel (and sets the cancelValue).

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.IsCanceled
member.summary: An iterator calls this to determine if Cancel has been called (possibly by a timer set by a call to SetCancelTimer).
member.returns: Returns True if Cancel has been called.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.IsCanceled(System.Object@)
member.summary: An iterator calls this to determine if Cancel has been called (possibly by a timer set by a call to SetCancelTimer).
member.param: Returns the cancelValue passed to Cancel.
member.returns: Returns True if Cancel has been called.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.SyncContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the SynchronizationContext object that the AsyncEnumerator uses when resuming your iterator. All value of null (the default), means that your iterator will execute via various thread pool threads.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.LastYieldReturnTimestamp
member.summary: Returns the timestamp at the last 'yield return' statement.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndObjectXxx
member.summary: Identifies an EndXxx method that takes an IAsyncResult and returns some result
member.param: The IAsyncResult of the completion operation.
member.returns: The EndXxx method's return value.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.EndVoidXxx
member.summary: Identifies an EndXxx method that takes an IAsyncResult and doesn't return a value
member.param: The IAsyncResult of the completion operation.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.DiscardableAsyncResult
member.summary: Class that wraps an asynchronous operation and its AsyncCallback method.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.DiscardableAsyncResult.SelfComplete
member.summary: Called when an DiscardableAsyncResult is being rejected/dicarded to ensure that its EndXxx method is invoked

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.AsyncResultWrapper
member.summary: A ValueType that abstracts an IAsyncResult (used for non-discard group operations) from a DiscardableAsyncResult (used for discard group operation). This type makes an IAsyncResult look like a DiscardableAsyncResult object without construction of another object

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts
member.summary: This struct contains a single Int32 member that encapsulates the number of items the enumerator is waiting for and the number of completed async operations in the inbox. All members of this type manipulate the counters atomically.

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.c_MaxWait
member.summary: Sentinal value used to indicate that a thread determined that it should call MoveNext again to advance the iterator

member.name: F:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.m_waitAndInboxCounts
member.summary: High 16 bits=number of inbox items to wait for before calling MoveNext Low 16 bits=number of items in inbox

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a WaitAndInboxCounts instance from an Int32
member.param: The Int32 instance.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.ToInt32
member.summary: Converts a WaitAndInboxCounts instance to an Int32
member.returns: The WaitAndInboxCounts object as an Int32.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the Wait to the sentinal value because we don't want a thread to MoveNext until the iterator has returned a Wait at least once

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.AtomicSetWait(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Atomically updates the number of inbox items the enumerator wants to wait for and returns the new value.
member.param: The number of asynchronous operations that must complete before the enumerator advances.
member.returns: Returns true if the calling thread met the requirements necessary to call the enumerator's MoveNext method.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.AtomicIncrementInbox
member.summary: Atomically updates the number of inbox items the enumerator wants to wait for and returns the new value.
member.returns: Returns true if the calling thread met the requirements necessary to call the enumerator's MoveNext method.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.AtomicDecrementInbox(System.Int32)
member.summary: Atomically subtracts the number of discarded items from the inbox.
member.param: The number of asynchronous operations that were discarded from the inbox.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.Wait
member.summary: Gets/Sets the number of items the enumerator is waiting for

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator.WaitAndInboxCounts.Inbox
member.summary: Gets/Sets the number of items in the inbox

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.NoEndMethodCalled
member.summary: This class is used when throwing an Exception to indicate that an operation is being discarded but no EndXxx method was specified and so resources are being leaked.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1
member.summary: A class that can drive an iterator asynchronously allowing for scalable and responsive applications and components.
member.typeparam: The type of result that the iterator method will return.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.FromAsyncResult(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Returns the AsyncEnumerator object used to obtain this IAsyncResult object.
member.param: An IAsyncResult object previously returned by calling BeginExecute.
member.returns: A reference to the AsyncEnumerator object that was used to call BeginExecute.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AsyncEnumerator class.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AsyncEnumerator class identified with a debug tag.
member.param: The desired debug tag name for this AsyncEnumerator object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.EndExecute(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous operation to complete.
member.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous operation to finish.
member.returns: The value set in the Result property by the iterator.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.OnConstructAsyncResult(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Called to construct an AsyncResult object with the specified callback function and state.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the iterator completes.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
member.returns: The AsyncResult object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.OnCompleteAsyncResult
member.summary: Called when the asynchronous operation completes.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncEnumerator`1.Result
member.summary: An iterator sets this property to return the value back to code that executed the iterator. Code that executed the iterator usually gets this value as the return value from Execute or EndExecute.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.FrozenUIExceptionArgs
member.summary: Indicates that a deadlock would occur because a the UI thread is waiting for an AsyncEnumerator to complete running but it can't since the UI thread is blocked.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.FrozenUIExceptionArgs.AsyncEnumerator
member.summary: Returns a reference to the AsyncEnumerator that the UI thread is waiting for.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.FrozenUIExceptionArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets a message that describes the current exception.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SendOrPostCallback
member.summary: Represents a method to be called when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context.
member.param: The object passed to the delegate.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SyncContextCallback
member.summary: Represents a method to be called when a message is to be dispatched from a synchronization context.
member.param: The method to be called.
The object passed to the delegate.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SynchronizationContext
member.summary: Provides the basic functionality for propagating a synchronization context in various synchronization models.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the SynchronizationContext class.
member.param: The method that processes the posted method.
The method that processes the sent method.

member.summary: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.

The object passed to the delegate.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SynchronizationContext.Send(Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SendOrPostCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context.

The object passed to the delegate.

member.name: P:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.SynchronizationContext.Current
member.summary: Gets the synchronization context for the current thread.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult
member.summary: Represents the status of an asynchronous operation that has no return type.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult.#ctor(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs an object that identifies an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The method that should be executed wehen the operation completes.
The object that can be obtained via the AsyncState property.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult.#ctor(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs an object that identifies an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The method that should be executed wehen the operation completes.
The object that can be obtained via the AsyncState property.
Identifies the object that is initiating the asynchronous operation. This object is obtainable via the InitiatingObject property.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult.SetAsCompleted(System.Exception,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this method to indicate that the asynchronous operation has completed.
member.param: If non-null, this argument identifies the exception that occuring while processing the asynchronous operation.
Indicates whether the operation completed synchronously or asynchronously.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult.EndInvoke
member.summary: Frees up resources used by the asynchronous operation represented by the IAsyncResult passed. If the asynchronous operation failed, this method throws the exception.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult.GetAsyncCallbackHelper
member.summary: Returns a single static delegate to a static method that will invoke the desired AsyncCallback
member.returns: The single static delegate.

member.summary: Returns an IAsyncResult for an operations that was queued to the thread pool.
member.returns: The IAsyncResult.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.AsyncResult`1.EndInvoke
member.summary: Frees up resources used by the asynchronous operation represented by the IAsyncResult passed. If the asynchronous operation failed, this method throws the exception. If the operation suceeded, this method returns the value calculated by the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The value calculated by the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Disposer
member.summary: Puts an IDisposable wrapper around a callback method allowing any method to be used with the C# using statement.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Disposer.#ctor(Wintellect.Disposer.DisposeMethod)
member.summary: Constructs a Dispose object around the specified method.
member.param: The method that should be called via Dispose.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Disposer.Dispose
member.summary: Invokes the desired method via this method.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Disposer.DisposeMethod
member.summary: A delegate that matches the signature of IDisposable's Dispose method.

member.name: T:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.ApmWrap`1
member.summary: This light-weight struct has the ability to associate an arbitrary piece of data (of type T) with any IAsyncResult object. When the asynchronous operation completes, the associated piece of data can be retrieved to complete processing. This struct is typically used when you are implementing code that wraps an asynchronous operation and you wish to add some context or state of your own to complete the wrapping.
member.typeparam: The type of the data you wish to embed in the IAsyncResult object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.ApmWrap`1.Callback(`0,System.AsyncCallback)
member.summary: Call this method to create an ApmWrap object around an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The data to embded in the ApmWrap object.
The callback method that should be invoked when the operation completes.
member.returns: An ApmWrap object's completion method.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.ApmWrap`1.Return(`0,System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Call this method to create an ApmWrap object around an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The data to embded in the ApmWrap object.
The original IAsyncResult object returned from the BeginXxx method.
member.returns: An ApmWrap object that contains the originally-returned IAsyncResult object.

member.name: M:Wintellect.Threading.AsyncProgModel.ApmWrap`1.Unwrap(System.IAsyncResult@)
member.summary: Cal this method to unwrap an ApmWrap object to get its embedded data and IAsyncResult.
member.param: A variable that will receive a reference to the wrapped IAsyncResult object.
member.returns: The embedded piece of data passed to the Callback/Return methods.
